alert.note: Alert for Kootenai (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 07 at 4:44PM MDT until August 07 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of North Idaho, including the following county, Kootenai. Portions of Northeast Washington, including the following county, Spokane. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Slow moving thunderstorms will increase the risk for urban flash flooding in the Spokane and Coeur d`Alene metro area. Rain amounts of a half inch or more may fall quickly leading to water over roads and rapid rises on small streams. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
